description.rawText: JOB DESCRIPTION We are looking for an experienced and passionate data scientist to join the Insights Team.  This is a hands-on role requiring deep expertise in applying machine learning techniques to improve business objectives and drive overall usage growth.  This role will requires you to be a number crunching data scientist one minute and critically thinking through strategic issues the next.  Strong communication skills are a must as this is a cross-functional role requiring you to work with product,  engineering and business teams.  Responsibilities  -Design,  develop and deliver new models/segmentations and their extension to new markets and products to drive customer acquisition and pipeline performance  -Conduct advanced data analysis to identify trends using data mining algorithms and alert the management on risk and opportunity  -Design,  manage and complete large analytical projects to determine trends and significant data relationships,  both independently and in partnership with others.   -Convey complex analytical findings to senior stakeholders  Translate business needs into data modeling,  analytical or tool-building initiatives Requirements  -Bachelors or Masters in Engineering,  Computer Science,  Mathematics,  Statistics,  Economics or related quantitative field from a top tier university,  or equivalent practical experience  -2+ years of relevant work experience  -Experience with statistical and quantitative modeling (e. g.  regression,  classification,  clustering,  etc)  -Experience working with datasets/data warehouses.  Experience managing projects while also handling ad hoc requests  -Experience with SQL,  Python,  R,  HTML,  JavaScript,  and/or other languages  -Strong communication and interpersonal skills
